name: eggiesss
description:
Eggiesss is a game that catch egg, enter and see how good are you to catch the egg!

This game is the result of my personal project as a game development from Telkom University. The production time of the game was 12 weeks with everything produced except sound and music.

I really hope you will enjoy this short game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Controls: left click - catch egg
